amendment.description: Amendment adds that the obligor must have had actual knowledge of the false material information for the exemption from liability to take effect.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 110-450 to add that the obligor must have had actual knowledge of the false material information for the exemption from liability to take effect.

action.text: Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Watt to the Hensarling amendment (A010).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Watt amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
